Package ca.retrylife.libepn

Class Pose

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.retrylife.libepn.Pose
  • public final class Pose
extends java.lang.Object
    A pose is an immutable representation of a position in 3D space. Poses are made up of a position vector, and a quaternion to denote rotation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Pose​(Pose other)
      Copy constructor for a Pose
      Pose​(org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Quaternion rotation)
      Create a pose at (0,0,0) with a rotation.
      Pose​(org.ejml.simple.SimpleMatrix position)
      Create a pose at a position with no rotation.
      Pose​(org.ejml.simple.SimpleMatrix position, double zAngle)
      Create a pose at a position with a single axis of rotation.
      Pose​(org.ejml.simple.SimpleMatrix position, QuaternionUtil.EulerAngles rotation)
      Create a pose at a position with an Euler rotation.
      Pose​(org.ejml.simple.SimpleMatrix position, org.apache.commons.math3.complex.Quaternion rotation)
      Create a pose at a position with a rotation.
      Pose​(org.ejml.simple.SimpleMatrix position, org.ejml.simple.SimpleMatrix lookingAt)
      Create a pose at a position facing another position.

      • getEulerRotation

        public QuaternionUtil.EulerAngles getEulerRotation()
        Get the Euler rotation of this pose. Warning: Precision may be lost in an effort to prevent gimbal lock. Gimbal lock may still occur in some cases.
        Returns:
        Euler rotation
